attributes.action:
Make confectionary giants go back to wrapping chocolate bars in paper.
wispa
attributes.additional_details: 27 years old plastic two wrapper recovered from the river thames.
attributes.background:
27 years after the best before date of a twix bar wrapped in plastic was fished out the river thames in near perfect condition.

We need manufacturers to quickly and swiftly make meaningful changes to save us and our planet dieing from plastic poison everywhere you look.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for manufacturers. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259176
